entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.37.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üöÄ Features

  • ToolJet Database queries for public apps by @akshaysasidrn in #9134 (#9067)

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Dark mode inconsistencies in ToolJet Database dashboard by @parthy007 in #9311 (#9276)

üìù Docs

  • Upgrade to Docusaurus v3 by @amanregu in #9397
  • Minor documentation fixes and updates

New Contributors

  • @prathamesh-sonpatki made their first contribution in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9375
  • @franz-josef-kaiser made their first contribution in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9373

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.36.1...v2.37.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.37.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Chore: updated superstore logic for state access @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9518
  • Fix : Replaced the icon of clear button in debugger to trash icon from right aligned icon by @manishkushare in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9528

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.37.0...v2.37.1

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.38.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Fix: The dashboard needs a refresh to get the add folder icon(+) back once the search icon is clicked by @609harsh in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9020
  • Fix: Notification modal resize by @Sadaf-A in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9448
  • Fix: Input field and cancel button should be disabled when an app import is in progress by @orinamio in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9446
  • Change a label related to workspace constants by @joelali5 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9218
  • Remove alternative styling for Workspace Constants header by @alewilliam789 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9284
  • Setting "#3A4251" as the highlight color for dark mode loading animation by @Sadaf-A in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9359
  • Apps card loading issue fix by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9519

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.37.0...v2.38.0
